entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who is trying to sneak out of the castle. He is determined and brave.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is Harry's friend who is also trying to sneak out of the castle. She is scared but willing to try.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts and lives in a nearby hut. He has a front door that Harry and Hermione are trying to avoid.

relationships.description: Harry and Hermione are sneaking out of the castle together, with Harry leading the way.
Harry is trying to avoid Hagrid's front door while sneaking out of the castle.
